author: Luis Cruz
subject: Lupin Audio Stream
body:
Found an audio stream that is all Lupin, all the time.
Some interesting tracks have been played on it since
I have been listening to it today.  Just put the
following URL into your favorite media player.

http://216.32.166.75:7812/

--- 
Luis A. Cruz
cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
